text: Brian Hitchen, CBE (8 July 1936 - 2 December 2013) was a British newspaper editor. Late in his career, he worked as a publisher.Obituary: Brian Hitchen, telegraph.co.uk, 3 December 2013 An incident with a car while crossing the road near Alicante, in Spain, led to his wife being killed instantly, while Hitchen himself died from his injuries a few hours later.Roy Greenslade ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:English journalists Category:British publishers Category:Writers from Lancashire Category:Commanders of the Order of the British Empire Category:British editors
